headline.main: BRIDGES URGES SALE OF SHIPS TO BRITAIN; Senator Asks Speedy Action in Shift of Merchantmen

lead_paragraph: An appeal for the United States to expedite the sale of needed merchantmen to Great Britain from the expanding American merchant marine was voiced here yesterday by Senator Styles Bridges of New Hampshire in a statement released through William Allen White's Committee to Defend America by Aiding the Allies.
abstract: Denies resigning from Com to Defend Amer
